name: Akroma, Angel of Fury
text:
Akroma, Angel of Fury can't be countered.
Flying, trample, protection from white and from blue
{R}: Akroma, Angel of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Morph {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red
flavor: "Wrath is no vice when inflicted upon the deserving."

name: Archangel of Strife
text:
Flying
As Archangel of Strife enters the battlefield, each player chooses war or peace.
Creatures controlled by players who chose war get +3/+0.
Creatures controlled by players who chose peace get +0/+3.

name: Aurelia, the Warleader
text: Flying, vigilance, haste\nWhenever Aurelia, the Warleader attacks for the first time each turn, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
flavor: Where Razia was aloof and untouchable, Aurelia is on the frontlines, calling for war.

name: Avacyn, Angel of Hope
text: Flying, vigilance, indestructible\nOther permanents you control have indestructible.
flavor: A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.

name: Baneslayer Angel
text: Flying, first strike, lifelink, protection from Demons and from Dragons
flavor: Some angels protect the meek and innocent. Others seek out and smite evil wherever it lurks.

name: Entreat the Angels
text: Put X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.\nMiracle {X}{W}{W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

name: Exalted Angel
text: Flying\nWhenever Exalted Angel deals damage, you gain that much life.\nMorph {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Iona, Shield of Emeria
text: Flying\nAs Iona, Shield of Emeria enters the battlefield, choose a color.\nYour opponents can't cast spells of the chosen color.
flavor: No more shall the righteous cower before evil.

name: Iridescent Angel
flavor: She enraptures all, encompasses all, endures all.

name: Jenara, Asura of War
text: Flying\n{1}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Jenara, Asura of War.
flavor: Wounded soldiers looked up, grateful for her appearance. But she passed over them, her eyes firmly on their foe.

name: Platinum Angel
text: Flying\nYou can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.
flavor: She is the apex of the artificer's craft, the spirit of the divine called out of base metal.

name: Serra Angel
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nVigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor: Born with wings of light and a sword of faith, this heavenly incarnation embodies both fury and purity.

name: Tariel, Reckoner of Souls
text: Flying, vigilance\n{T}: Choose a creature card at random from target opponent's graveyard. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control.
flavor: "After death you face paradise, damnation, or Tariel."\n—Priest's teaching
